text.section:
The Commissioner shall:
compile an annual summary report based on the information provided:
under subsection (a) of this section; and
by the Secretary under § 19-705.2(e) of the Health - General Article; and
provide copies of the summary report to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, to the General Assembly.
